mapper.update: update c_project set pjtName = #{pjtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pjtSynopsis = #{pjtsynopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pjtAdds = #{pjtadds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrr = #{lrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pjtType = #{pjttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pjtNature = #{pjtnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bidManager = #{bidmanager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bidExpDate = #{bidexpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, bidExpCost = #{bidexpcost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expCntCost = #{expcntcost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, devOrg = #{devorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, designOrg = #{designorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervisoroOrg = #{supervisoroorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stat = #{stat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `end` = #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, pjtName, pjtSynopsis, pjtAdds, lrr, pjtType, pjtNature, bidManager, bidExpDate, bidExpCost, expCntCost, devOrg, contacts, phone, remark, designOrg, supervisoroOrg, add_time, last_time, price, stat, `end` from c_project where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
